name: interactionID
description: ID for Targetome drug to target interaction

name: drugID
description: ID of drug involved in interaction

name: targetID
description: ID of target (e.g., protein, DNA, RNA) involved in interaction

name: interactionType
description: Type of Targetome interaction, e.g., Antagonist, Inhibition, etc.

name: drug_approvalDate
description: Date drug was approved for use

name: drug_atcClassID
description: Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) drug classification ID

name: drug_atcClassName
description: Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) drug classification name

name: drug_epcClassID
description: FDA Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) drug classification ID

name: drug_epcClassName
description: FDA Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) drug classification name

name: targetType
description: Type of Targetome target (e.g., protein, DNA, or RNA)

name: sourceID
description: ID for source supporting Targetome interaction

name: expID
description: ID for experimental evidence supporting Targetome interaction
